content: description the basketweave stitch is a classic and versatile strong stitch pattern that is perfect for creating beautiful and textured knitted projects such as scarves blankets and even sweaters with this step-by-step guide you ll be able to master this stitch in no time so grab your knitting needles and yarn and let s get started yarn 1 x ball of the pima cotton yarn from we are knitters this yarn is 3 5 oz/100g/232 yds/212 m you can make two dishcloths with this amount of cotton yarn or 1 x 50g cotton yarn suitable for 4 5 mm us 7 knitting needles or 5 mm us 8 needles any dk/light worsted/8 ply yarn or aran/worsted/10 ply yarn i would recommend using cotton needles knitting needles size us 7 or 8 / 4 5mm or 5 mm us 8 knitting needles usually work well with medium-weight cotton yarn skills level - beginner sizing 26 x 26 cm/10 x 10 inches don t forget to follow handy little me on social media for more updates and to share your finished projects instagram @handylittleme facebook facebook com/handylittleme ravelry ravelry com/people/handylittleme pinterest pinterest co uk/handylittleme copyright the patterns and photographs of this design are the property of handy little me this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern collection or any items created using the directions in this pattern collection without consent please visit my terms of use page for additional information
